oosysteme.strategies

Class DistanceHaltStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • oosysteme.BaseStrategy
      • oosysteme.strategies.DistanceHaltStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Strategy

    public class DistanceHaltStrategy
extends BaseStrategy
    Distance halt strategy that gets called when robot needs to stop because of object in front.
